field.name: title
field.title: Title
field.description: Appears as the donation form tab name and on the receipt

field.name: description
field.title: Description
field.description: A description of the item. Shown only on receipt

field.name: donation_only
field.title: Donation Only?
field.description: If checked, treat purchases of this product as donations. This is useful, for example, to create a form with multiple donation line items to different target funds allowing the user to allocate individual amounts to each line item. IMPORTANT: If you check this, set the price to 1

field.description: If provided, shown as a separate attribute on receipt
